mapper.select: SELECT az.ACTTYPENAME, a.ACTNAME, mb.YR, mb.MTH, mb.ACTBALANCE, c.ISOCODE FROM MONTHLYBALANCE mb INNER JOIN ACCOUNTS a ON mb.ACTID = a.ACTID INNER JOIN ACCOUNTTYPES az ON a.ACTTYPEID = az.ACTTYPEID INNER JOIN CURRENCIES c ON a.CURRENCYID = c.CURRENCYID WHERE mb.YR = #{yr} AND mb.MTH = #{mth} ORDER BY az.ACTTYPEID, a.ACTNAME;

SELECT a.ACTNAME, mb.YR, mb.MTH, mb.ACTBALANCE, c.ISOCODE FROM MONTHLYBALANCE mb INNER JOIN ACCOUNTS a ON mb.ACTID = a.ACTID INNER JOIN CURRENCIES c ON a.CURRENCYID = c.CURRENCYID WHERE ((mb.YR>#{yr}) OR (mb.YR=#{yr} AND mb.MTH >= #{mth})) AND a.ACTNAME = #{actName} ORDER BY mb.YR, mb.MTH;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT mb.YR, mb.MTH, sum(mb.ACTBALANCE) AS ExpenseBalance FROM MONTHLYBALANCE mb INNER JOIN ACCOUNTS a ON mb.ACTID = a.ACTID INNER JOIN ACCOUNTTYPES az ON a.ACTTYPEID = az.ACTTYPEID INNER JOIN BUDGETDETAIL bd ON mb.ACTID = bd.ACTID AND mb.MTH = bd.MTH INNER JOIN BUDGET b ON bd.BUDGETID = b.BUDGETID WHERE mb.YR =#{yr} AND b.BUDGETNAME = #{budgetName} GROUP BY mb.YR, mb.MTH) exp INNER JOIN ( SELECT b.BUDGETID, b.BUDGETNAME, bd.mth as bdgmth, SUM(bd.amount) as BudgetBalance FROM BUDGET b INNER JOIN BUDGETDETAIL bd ON b.budgetid = bd.budgetid WHERE b.budgetname = #{budgetName} GROUP BY b.BUDGETID, b.budgetname, bd.mth) bud ON exp.mth = bud.bdgmth ORDER BY exp.YR, exp.MTH;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT mb.YR, mb.MTH, sum(mb.ACTBALANCE) AS ExpenseBalance FROM MONTHLYBALANCE mb INNER JOIN ACCOUNTS a ON mb.ACTID = a.ACTID INNER JOIN ACCOUNTTYPES az ON a.ACTTYPEID = az.ACTTYPEID INNER JOIN BUDGETDETAIL bd ON mb.ACTID = bd.ACTID AND mb.MTH = bd.MTH INNER JOIN BUDGET b ON bd.BUDGETID = b.BUDGETID WHERE mb.YR =#{yr} AND b.BUDGETNAME = #{budgetName} AND a.ACTNAME = #{actName} GROUP BY mb.YR, mb.MTH) exp INNER JOIN ( SELECT b.BUDGETID, b.BUDGETNAME, bd.mth as bdgmth, SUM(bd.amount) as BudgetBalance FROM BUDGET b INNER JOIN BUDGETDETAIL bd ON b.budgetid = bd.budgetid INNER JOIN ACCOUNTS a ON bd.ACTID = a.ACTID WHERE b.budgetname = #{budgetName} AND a.ACTNAME = #{actName} GROUP BY b.BUDGETID, b.budgetname, bd.mth) bud ON exp.mth = bud.bdgmth ORDER BY exp.YR, exp.MTH;

SELECT mb.YR, mb.MTH, SUM(CASE WHEN az.ACTTYPENAME = 'Expense' THEN mb.ACTBALANCE ELSE 0 END) AS ExpenseBalance, SUM(CASE WHEN az.ACTTYPENAME = 'Liability' THEN mb.ACTBALANCE ELSE 0 END) AS LiabilityBalance, SUM(CASE WHEN az.ACTTYPENAME = 'Income' THEN mb.ACTBALANCE ELSE 0 END) AS IncomeBalance FROM MONTHLYBALANCE mb INNER JOIN ACCOUNTS a ON mb.ACTID = a.ACTID INNER JOIN ACCOUNTTYPES az ON a.ACTTYPEID = az.ACTTYPEID INNER JOIN CURRENCIES c ON a.CURRENCYID = c.CURRENCYID WHERE mb.YR >= #{yr}-1 GROUP BY mb.YR, mb.MTH ORDER BY mb.YR, mb.MTH;
